name: Preschool
description: Kangaroos Preschool accepts both full- and part-time students and offers a low teacher-to-student ratio. Our caring and experienced teachers will help students with potty training and get them ready for kindergarten. We have worked on creating a developmentally appropriate curriculum for youngsters with quality care at all times! Enjoy our newly remodeled facilities and catered lunch options.

whatTheyOffer: Kangaroos Preschool accepts both full- and part-time students and offers a low teacher-to-student ratio. Our caring and experienced teachers will help students with potty training and get them ready for kindergarten. We have worked on creating a developmentally appropriate curriculum for youngsters with quality care at all times! Enjoy our newly remodeled facilities and catered lunch options.
howToGetIt: Kangaroos Preschool enrolls children between the ages of 2 and 6. We are open year-round, Monday through Friday, from 7:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., with both full- and part-time options. Potty training is not required. Please email kangaroossf@gmail.com or call 415-333-1500 to schedule a tour.
cost: This is a food based service.
